Title: Tenchi the Movie - Tenchi Muyo in Love
Actors: Matt K. Miller, Megumi Hayashibara, Yuri Amano
Plot: Tenchi and co. find their existence unsettled by a time-travelling entity called Kain. Desiring revenge upon the Juraian emperor, Tenchi, Kain travels back in time to kill Tenchi's mother. Trying to preserve the timestream, Tenchi...
